name: list-group
title: List Group
description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying not only simple lists of elements, but complex ones with custom content.

options.name: state
options.description: A color context on the individual <vs-list-group-item>.

options.name: active
options.description: An active state on the individual <vs-list-group-item>.

options.name: disabled
options.description: A disabled state on the individual <vs-list-group-item>.

options.name: flush
options.description: Removes borders if set to true.
